visualobjects

Class EditableTextWrapper<L extends LogicalObject>

  • java.lang.Object
    • visualobjects.VisualObject<T>
      • visualobjects.TextWrapper<L>
        • visualobjects.EditableTextWrapper<L>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AsciiTypable, FunctionTypable, Typable, DeleteListener, DeleteSubject, UpdateListener, UpdateSubject, Editable

    public class EditableTextWrapper<L extends LogicalObject>
extends TextWrapper<L>
implements UpdateListener, UpdateSubject, Editable
    A wrapper for the GUI Text to adapt it to the application part.
